attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is horrible it took many days to download. Once it finally downloaded there were so many pop up adds and when I accidentally clicked one it took me to a strange website and now my phone is full with viruses and my Apple ID and other passwords have been stolen. Not to mention my phone was barely functioning because of all the viruses so I had to buy a whole new phone. DO NOT BUY. It is a terrible app and I wish I could give it 0 stars.
